To keep coding, poke around the Android project. For instance, have a look at the way the app shares a single instance of RestAdapter through GuideApplication, or read through more of the comments in the Lesson Fragments.

If you get lost, holler at us:

callback@strongloop.com

Welcome to the LoopBack Guide Application!

The next three Lessons will teach you a little about LoopBack, a self-hosted and open-source mobile API tier from StrongLoop.

Let\'s not waste any time with words. This is a simple Fragment - just swipe to the next page to get started.

Lesson One: One Model, Hold the Schema

This form creates a new Note model on the server. Note, mind you has no pre-defined format!

See LessonOneFragment.java for implementation details, paying special attention to the NoteModel class and the LessonOneFragment.sendRequest method.
